panel__settings__snack__subheader.message: Note that snackbar banner are dependant on content script injection into tabs.

panel__settings__snack__position_subhead.message: Changes where the snackbar notifications are displayed from.

panel__settings__snack__timeout_subheade.message: Define how long the notification is displayed before being dismissed.

panel__settings__snack__level_subheader.message: Levels are cumulative and show all notifications from a lower level.

panel__settings__snack__popup_subheader.message: Enables or disables snackbar notifications within the popup.

panel__settings__snack__tab_subheader.message: Enables or disables snackbar notifications inside active tabs.
